required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment for Subjects With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
clinical_study.official_title: Open-Label Study to Assess the Safety of Etanercept Liquid Administered Once Weekly in Subjects With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety of etanercept liquid administered once weekly to subjects with RA.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects having positive immunoassay response to etanercept liquid during the treatment period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events, infectious episodes, serious adverse events, serious infectious episodes

results_reference.citation: Dore RK, Mathews S, Schechtman J, Surbeck W, Mandel D, Patel A, Zhou L, Peloso P. The immunogenicity, safety, and efficacy of etanercept liquid administered once weekly in patients with rheumatoid arthritis. Clin Exp Rheumatol. 2007 Jan-Feb;25(1):40-6.
